document_data.mainbody: The '''Mountains of Amara''' were a range in northern [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Geography: The mountain range was found to the east of the larger [[Koryaz Mountains]], bordering the low-lying [[Ama Basin]] and the [[Yellow Sea]]. To the south lay the [[Bang Zi Mara Shan]] mountains closer to [[Chukei]] and the island of [[Talmaruk]], and to the west deep within the mountains was the [[Valley of Nanayok]]. At the northeast edge of the Mountains of Amara was the fallen [[Netherese enclave]] of [[Urvraunt]], a long-lost and never rediscovered ruin.
